Changes in the pelagic food web structure occurred in the Bay of Seine while the benthic trophic guilds showed changes in the Elbe Plume over time.

sentences.content: Key Message
The Ecological Network Analysis indices support the assessment of the structure and functioning of f...
webs by analysing interactions between all ecosystem components for four case studies.
Different trends of
indices were found over time and space, some linked to variability in primary production.
Conclusion
This pilot assessment illustrates the potential for the ENA indices indicator to show changes in the...
food webs at regional (COMP4 assessment areas) scale and provides key information on the temporal
variability of food web structure and functioning. This pilot assessment demonstrates inter-annual
variability within study sites and variability between them.
Conclusion (extended)
This pilot assessment illustrates the potential for the ENA indices indicator to show changes in the...
structure and functioning at regional (COMP4 assessment areas) scale and provides information on the...
of the food webs.
The pilot assessments indicate that ENA indices are influenced by the availability of primary produc...
